text.data-name: At "Next" , we pride ourselves on our exceptional team of six members, each a market leader in their field. With a blend of sharp skills, creative minds, and a passion for innovation, we're dedicated to turning your ideas into reality. Your vision is o
text.tspan: " , we pride ourselves on our exceptional team of six members, each a market leader in their field. With
a blend of sharp skills, creative minds, and a passion for innovation, we're dedicated to turning your ideas into
reality. Your vision is our canvas, and our skilled team is here to make it happen. Together, we transcend boundaries
